nodes.name: Hand 2 Hand Fix
nodes.summary: Replaces the broken MCP/openmw strength option with a proper balanced vanilla hand to hand fix. With this, a player wanting to have a monk type character will now find hand to hand a viable skill and fun to use.

nodes.name: Westly Master Head Pack X plus Original Faces Compilation
nodes.summary: This is simply a compilation of the Westly's Master Head Pack X and the Original Faces Mod.  Original Faces was created for the master head pack, but they were never put together in one place. This mod does that. Enjoy.

nodes.name: Madd Leveler
nodes.summary: This is just a re-upload of a mod that exists elsewhere but not on Nexus.  I am owed zero credit for this mod.  I just want to make sure this legendary mod doesnt disappear off the web forever...  This is a leveling mod that removes the

nodes.name: Ebony Shortword Returns
nodes.summary: There used to be an ebony shortword hidden in the Odai Plataeu in a previous version of Morrowind.  But for some reason a later version of morrowind clipped the sword under the ground so its impossible to get. This mod moves the sword back

nodes.name: Morrowind - Hardcore Mode
nodes.summary: For experienced players, Morrowind can get to be way too easy.  If you want to up your game and enjoy a new Morrowind experience that is very challenging, yet fun, fair, rewarding, and free of exploits, then this mod is for you.  Check out
